about_the_game:
Step into the extraordinary world of Banishing You, a captivating visual novel where your choices shape the journey.

Bored of your mundane routine? Accept a mysterious invitation that whisks you away to a dream realm, filled with enigmatic characters and intriguing challenges. Navigate passive-aggressive comments, hidden motives, and unravel a quest that could save or doom both worlds.



Personalized Experience:
Enter into the dream world as a non-descript, non-gendered main character that you get to name and play according to your own preferences, ensuring a uniquely personalized experience.

Multiple Endings:Experience a narrative with diverse outcomes, offering a range of very different endings shaped by your decisions throughout the game.



Romance Options:Forge connections in the dream world with romancable male characters, each with distinct personalities. Uncover a surprise option that adds an unexpected twist to your journey. Or decide to forgo romance and focus on saving the world.



Choice-Driven Gameplay:Navigate the dream world through a myriad of choices. Explore different paths and uncover the mysteries that await.

Achievements:Test your skills and unravel alternative aspects of the story with a variety of achievements.

Hand Drawn:Banishing you features hand drawn, animated backgrounds and sprites.



Immerse yourself in this dream world, where every decision counts and adventure awaits. Will you save the world or watch it burn?

highlighted.name: You talked to Ende in the Garden

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

name: Banishing You

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Step into the world of Banishing You, a visual novel where choices shape your journey. Accept a mysterious invitation to a dream realm full of enigmatic characters and challenges. Navigate passive-aggressive comments, flirtatious strangers, and unravel a quest that could save or doom both worlds.
